review: Received the item as a Christmas gift. The remote is absolutely impossible to open to put in batteries. Broke both thumb nails and still can not get it open. Tried the help from customers section and found other people had the same problem. What good is the Amazon Fire TV if you can not install batteries to operate. Suggestion: The remote is poorly designed and needs a complete redesign. DO NOT BUY until Amazon solves this problem.

review: I bought this for my 17 year old son for Christmas. So far he is loving it, with the exception of having interference from his brothers kindle fires. If my son is watching a movie on the Fire TV, my 2 younger sons can pause the movie using their Kindle Fires. Or if the Kindle Fire is close to the FireTV it changes to what ever the Kindle has on it (game or whatever). This is disappointing because my husband and I were planning to buy the Fire TV for ourselves, but we use our Kindles all the time while watching TV. This will be an issue! I hope Amazon can fix this issue!!!
